ðŸ”¥ youtube-live-tts | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enable YouTube live stream viewers' chat messages to be read aloud in real-time using AI-generated voices, enhancing viewer engagement and accessibility.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time chat monitoring â€¢ AI-powered voices (ElevenLabs) â€¢ Modern web dashboard â€¢ Customizable templates â€¢ Smart message queue
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a real-time text-to-speech service for YouTube live streams, converting chat messages into spoken audio using ElevenLabs AI voices. It features a web dashboard for configuration and monitoring, with options for customization, spam protection, and cross-platform compatibility.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ ShowUI-Aloha | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating repetitive computer tasks by learning from human demonstrations.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Records human demonstrations (screen, mouse, keyboard) â€¢ Learns semantic action traces â€¢ Plans new tasks based on learned workflows â€¢ Executes reliably with OS-level actions â€¢ Generalizes from single demonstrations to task families
ðŸ“– Summary: ShowUI-Aloha is a human-taught computer-use agent for Windows and macOS that learns workflows from recorded demonstrations. It generalizes these learnings to plan and execute new task variants, performing OS-level actions like clicks, typing, and scrolling.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ tiktok-live-recorder | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Recording and saving TikTok live streams for later viewing.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Records TikTok live streams â€¢ Captures both audio and video â€¢ Supports recording via username, URL, or room ID â€¢ Offers different recording modes (manual, automatic, followers) â€¢ Allows customization of checking intervals and output directories
ðŸ“– Summary: This Python tool records TikTok live streams, capturing both audio and video. It allows users to save and revisit live content for later viewing or analysis, serving creators, researchers, and general users interested in preserving TikTok live moments.
